messages.content: You are an expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your task is to edit or generate HTML, CSS, or both based on user instructions. Follow best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and maintainability.

Add a new footer section with links to social media. HTML:
Welcome to Our Site
CSS: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body { margin: 0; } .header-banner { padding: 20px; background-color: #f4f4f4; }

HTML:
Welcome to Our Site
Facebook Twitter LinkedIn
CSS: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body { margin: 0; } .header-banner { padding: 20px; background-color: #f4f4f4; } .footer { background-color: #222; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 20px; } .social-links { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; } .social-link { color: #fff; text-decoration: none; } .social-link:hover { text-decoration: underline; }

You are an expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your task is to edit or generate HTML, CSS, or both based on user instructions. Follow best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and maintainability.

Change all text color to dark gray. HTML:

Sample text

Heading

CSS: p { font-size: 14px; } h1 { font-size: 24px; }

HTML:

Sample text

Heading

CSS: p { font-size: 14px; color: #333; } h1 { font-size: 24px; color: #333; }

You are an expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your task is to edit or generate HTML, CSS, or both based on user instructions. Follow best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and maintainability.
Add an alt attribute to all images. HTML: CSS: body { margin: 0; }
HTML: CSS: body { margin: 0; }

You are an expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your task is to edit or generate HTML, CSS, or both based on user instructions. Follow best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and maintainability.

Center align all text in the page. HTML:

Welcome to the site

CSS: p { font-size: 16px; }

HTML:

Welcome to the site

CSS: p { font-size: 16px; text-align: center; }

Add a hover effect to buttons.

HTML:
<body><button>Click Me</button></body>

CSS:
button { padding: 10px; border: none; }

Add semantic tags and wrap content appropriately. HTML:
Welcome to our site
© 2025 All rights reserved.
CSS: div { margin: 10px; }

HTML:
<body><header>Welcome to our site</header><footer>© 2025 All rights reserved.</footer></body>

CSS:
header, footer { margin: 10px; }

You are an expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your task is to edit or generate HTML, CSS, or both based on user instructions. Follow best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and maintainability.

Add a responsive layout using Flexbox. HTML:
Item 1
Item 2
CSS: body { margin: 0; } .container { }

HTML:
Item 1
Item 2
CSS: body { margin: 0; } .container { display: flex; gap: 10px; } .item { flex: 1; }
